summary: In this conversation, the customer was looking to upgrade their phone with Contoso Wireless and the agent was able to provide them with information on a 65-inch 4K Ultra HD Smart TV that was currently on sale for $799.99. The customer was also able to take advantage of a deal where they received a free pair of Contoso Wireless headphones valued at $99.99 with their purchase by using the coupon code "UPGRADE" during checkout.
